issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The described issue is not actually a problem - it is as designed.
resolution.name: Not A Problem

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Getting below exceptions continuously when i fired around 100 thread to my spring-jms application.Looks like its not able to add new connection in the PooledConnectionFactory even though there is no active connections in the Pool. Check logs below :

javax.jms.JMSException: Error while attempting to add new Connection to the pool

    at org.apache.activemq.jms.pool.PooledConnectionFactory.createConnection(PooledConnectionFactory.java:204) ~[cloud-gateway-final.jar:?]

fields.summary: Timer has cancelled exception in AbstarctInactivityMonitor
fields.environment: Integrated activemq-spring with Netty framework and created a PooledConenctionFactory. OS is Linux

comments.body: From the error the cause is that the connection to the broker can't be created and so obviously can't be added to the pool.  You'd need to investigate the issue from the angle of why your client can't connect to the broker.
